item.title: ZSH Shenanigans
item.description: Aliases Python Aliases alias pip='python3 -m pip' alias python='python3' alias py='python3' ls Alias Because ls does not automagically add color alias ls='ls --color' Prompt customization checkout the sourcefile for more, here I am going to detail the customization that I add. export PROMPT=$'%F{green}%B%n%b%f %F{111}%3~%f %(?.%F{green}\U279c%f.%F{009}\U279c%f) ' $ : Required for unicode parsing %F….%f is for setting Foreground colors, colors specified in {color/color_code} format %B….%b for bold text %n for username %m for machine name (condensed) %~ for pwd, but with $HOME prefix, 3 for the number of parent dirs to show alternatively use %d or %/ for full paths \U0000 for unicode %(?
